comments.body: short circuit on empty configFilePath and return nil, nil?
oh, I guess in that case, we get all plugins also referencing an empty file name...

relative filepaths in the Location fields should resolve relative to the original config file. after we return here, we've lost the information about the original location, so that should probably happen here.

would like a couple sanity check unit tests:

* load a v1.5 admission config file and check the resulting config struct
* load a versioned config file and check the resulting config struct
* test relative file path resolution

(see plugin/pkg/scheduler/algorithmprovider/defaults/compatibility_test.go for an example)
